DynamicsCompressorNodeRatio.summary: The ratio property of the interface Is a k-rate representing the amount of change, in dB, needed in the input for a 1 dB change in the output.

remarks.para: The ratio property's default value is 12 and it can be set between 1 and 20.

para.see: Describes the effect of different ratio on the output signal

DynamicsCompressorNodeRatio.value:
An .
NOTEThough the returned is read-only, the value it represents is not.
